00039 void Segment_axi::calculer_volumes(DoubleVect& volumes) const
00040 {
00041   const Zone& zone=ma_zone.valeur();
00042   const DomaineAxi1d& dom = ref_cast(DomaineAxi1d,zone.domaine());
00043 
00044   int S1,S2;
00045 
00046   int size_tot = zone.nb_elem_tot();
00047   assert(volumes.size_totale()==size_tot);
00048 
00049   assert(dimension==3);
00050 
00051   for (int num_poly=0; num_poly<size_tot; num_poly++)
00052     {
00053       S1 = zone.sommet_elem(num_poly,0);
00054       S2 = zone.sommet_elem(num_poly,1);
00055 
00056       double x0 = dom.origine_repere(num_poly,0);
00057       double y0 = dom.origine_repere(num_poly,1);
00058 
00059       double x1 = dom.coord(S1,0);
00060       double x2 = dom.coord(S2,0);
00061 
00062       double y1 = dom.coord(S1,1);
00063       double y2 = dom.coord(S2,1);
00064 
00065       double r1 = sqrt((x1-x0)*(x1-x0)+(y1-y0)*(y1-y0));
00066       double r2 = sqrt((x2-x0)*(x2-x0)+(y2-y0)*(y2-y0));
00067 
00068 
00069       volumes[num_poly]= M_PI*fabs(r2*r2-r1*r1);
00070     }
00071 }
